title: [Solhaven, South Market South]
description: Perched on the corner where Salters' Road enters the market from the south is a maoral-sided store with shallow steps leading up to its carved maoral door.  Light from the shop shines through the myriad of small crystal bottles resting on narrow shelves close behind the windows, setting each aglow with a different shade of red, yellow, green, blue or violet.

Perched on the corner where Salters' Road enters the market from the south is a maoral-sided store with shallow steps leading up to its carved thanot door.  Light from the shop shines through the myriad of small crystal bottles resting on narrow shelves close behind the windows, setting each aglow with a different shade of red, yellow, green, blue or violet.

Perched on the corner where Salters' Road enters the market from the south is a maoral-sided store with shallow steps leading up to its carved thanot door.  A myriad of small crystal bottles rest on narrow shelves close behind the shop's windows, casting a pattern of tiny wedge-shaped rainbows on the planks of Salters' Road.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
